short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below: Absorber, Overvoltage, to be delivered to CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt.
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement for Absorber Overvoltage Product
### Title
NSN: 5920-01-349-3483 Absorber Overvoltage

### Reference
Publication Date: 2022-10-19
Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-28T14:00:00
Amendment Number: 1
Solicitation Number: W8482-230955/A

### Description
The Department of National Defence is issued a request for proposal for the procurement of absorber overvoltage products. The products are required for delivery to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

### Requirements

* Item 1: Quantity 12, Unit of Issue: EA, Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 2: Quantity 8, Unit of Issue: EA, Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Specifications
* GSIN: N5920
* NSN: 5920-01-349-3483
* Part Number: FCC-350B-350-EIAEC3NF
* NCAGE: 53779, Fischer Custom Communications, Inc.

### Documents
The documents for this procurement are available in both English and French:

* Attachment 1: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/04/5af6fd2d429d67fa108eafb17f7ddf9b/w8482-230955_amendment_1_eng.pdf
* Attachment 2: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/19/bea1c655ed2d9be454476d52e4959b89/rfp_w8482-230955_eng_clauses.pdf
* Attachment 3: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/19/60fd12d82a79b7090d150ac72147124d/rfp_w8482-230955_fr_clauses.pdf
* Attachment 4: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/04/3b1ce7085a8cb4089b8f3bd46f13a921/w8482-230955_amendment_1_fren.pdf

### Languages
The documents can be submitted in either
